entries.meaning: The act of cutting of the hair, often done professionally by a barber, hair stylist, or beautician.
The style into which the hair is cut.
(law) In a bankruptcy proceeding, the proportional reduction in the debt that will be paid to each creditor, based on an evaluation of the total debt owed and the total assets of the debtor.
(finance) The difference between the value of a loan and the value of its collateral.

verbs.description: haircut (third-person singular simple present haircuts, present participle haircutting, simple past and past participle haircutted)

entries.meaning: To reduce the value assigned to an asset.
